tool.name: MFAssignR SNplot
tool.description: Noise level assessment using the SNplot function.

configfiles.configfile:
df <- read.delim("$input_file", sep="\t") SNplot <- MFAssignR::SNplot( df = df, cut = $cut, mass = $mass, window.x = $window_x, window.y = $window_y )
ggplot2::ggsave(filename = "SNplot.png", SNplot)

tool.help: SNplot function plots the mass spectrum with the S/N cut denoted by different colors for the mass spectrum peaks (red indicates noise, blue indicates signal). This is useful for a qualitative look at the effectiveness of the S/N cut being used.
